summary: Virtual landowners have found a way to put their investments to work, but with unintended consequences.
title: Metaverse Landlords Are Creating a New Class System
detailed_content: FOR THE MODEST price of 10,000 mana tokens (or $7,000) per day, anyone can rent land parcel 27,87 in Decentraland, a 3D virtual world that runs on the Ethereum blockchain. Renting the plot would give the tenant the right to build anything they please—a shop, an event space, an art installation, or whatever else—to host friendly passersby. But the real winner would be their landlord, who goes by the name Beatrix#7239, their virtual pockets bulging with cash.
author: BY JOEL KHALILI
